mapper.select: insert into boardpost(boardNumber, postTitle, postContent, nickname, postDate, postTime, lookupCount, postRecommendCount, postNotRecommendCount) values(#{boardNumber}, #{postTitle}, #{postContent}, #{nickname}, #{postDate}, #{postTime}, #{lookupCount}, #{postRecommendCount}, #{postNotRecommendCount})

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM boardpost ORDER BY postNumber DESC )A WHERE (@ROWNUM:=0)=0)B WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} AND boardNumber = #{boardNumber}
select postContent from boardpost where nickname = #{nickname} and postTitle = #{postTitle}
update boardpost set postTitle = #{postTitle}, postContent = #{postContent} where postNumber = #{postNumber}
update boardpost set postRecommendCount = #{postRecommendCount} where postNumber = #{postNumber}
select count(*) from boardpost where boardNumber=#{boardNumber}
update boardpost set postNotRecommendCount = #{postNotRecommendCount} where postNumber = #{postNumber}
